title: A Killer On The Run
description:
5 x 15 minutes

Kenneth Noye was a major criminal, involved in the Brinks Matt gold robbery in the 1980s, acquitted of the murder of an undercover policeman and seemingly untouchable. His downfall came with the road rage killing of a stranger on the M25 circular motorway around London. He went on the run, but the police were not going to give up their search for him.

New posting of previous torrent, following loss of torrent files after an HDD failure.
